about_the_game:
Mechanical Fury blends the unyielding combat of Doom Eternal and the Incredibly vertical platforming of Ghostrunner to scratch that movement shooter itch!


With bloodthirsty mechs attacking from each direction, Eeach engagement becomes a thrilling puzzle. Every split-second decision will be the difference between life and death!


Embrace gravity-defying action as you Grapple, Kick and DESTROY through hordes of enemies. Uncover the secrets of the Forbidden Island to dominate the arena!


Your arm was severed and replaced with a grappling hook by the evil Doctor Adrian! Team up with your girlfriend and get revenge by obliterating his Machine Army before he invokes the Second Armageddon!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any reasonable new Linux distro from CentOS 7.x and up
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 3.141529
  • Processor: A CD with Sanic Hill Zone.mp3 burned into it labelled Imtel
  • Memory: 69 MB RAM
  • Graphics: I ran out of jokes but the point is that it should run on your device
